content.rendered:
Directed by Gurmmeet Singh

Written by Jasvinder Bath. Ravi Shankaran

Cast Katrina Kaif (Ragini). Ishaan Khattar (Gullu aka Galileo Parthasarthy (as Ishaan)). Siddhant Chaturvedi (Major aka Sherdil Shergill). Jackie Shroff (Aatmaram Shastrashakti). Armaan Ralhan (Dushyant (as Arrmaan Ralhan)). Manuj Sharma (Raahu). Shrikant Verma (Ketu). Sheeba Chaddha (Chikni Chudail). Nidhi Bisht (Lady Daayana). Surender Thakur (Raaka). Manu Rishi Chadha (Major’s Father). Kedar Shankar (Gullu’s Father). Shreya Lodhia (Dolly Kulkarni). Anuksha Suguna Pushparaj (Laavanya). Vipul Deshpande (Mr. Kulkarni). Deepti Lele (Mrs. Kulkarni). Farrukh Seyer (Aslam Autowala). Kuldeep Kushwaha (Pappu Pizzawala). Jugal Kishore (Milkman at Door). Mehul Buch (Builder Brijesh). Siraj (Broker Hasmukh). Dnyanesh Wadekar (Dushyant’s Stepbrother #1). Soneer Vadhera (Dushyant’s Stepbrother #2). Kalpana Ajaney (Daadi’s Bhoot). Dinesh Marwadi (Dulha’s Bhoot). Almaaz Sheikh (Nurse’s Bhoot). Mela Singh (Noorie). Mohit Thakur (Johnny Dushman). Prerna Gandhi (Brijesh’s Mother). Bhakti Rathod (Brijesh’s Wife). Heet Sharma (Brijesh’s Son). Sabina Shaikh (Brijesh’s Maid). SSukhita Iyer (Laavanya’s Mother). Nayeem Shaikh (Laavanya’s Father). Nabil Khan (Aslam’s Son). Madhavi (Aslam’s Wife). Amol Prachure (News Anchor). Anil Sachdeva (Software Engineer). Sunny Dhillon (Farmer’s Bhoot). Jananta Juri (Female Bhoot). Vipin Vinod Surve (Dead Man at Morgue). Bittu Babu (Evil Midget). Riya Bhattacharya (Evil Bollywood Vamp). Aishwarya Chodankar (Nurse at Morgue). Ninad Marathe (Doctor at Morgue). Manohar Verma (Watchman at Daadi’s Bungalow). Pulkit Samrat (Prank Caller #1 (as Pulkit Sharma)). Varun Sharma (Prank Caller #1). Manjot Singh (Prank Caller #1). Hitika Gupta (Prank Caller #2). Kavish Handa (Prank Caller #3). Divyendu Sharma (Prank Caller #4). Shaheem Bhat (Prank Caller #5). Tahoor Qadri (Prank Caller #5). Shipra Singh Acharya (Prank Caller #6). Vyom Vyas (Daadi’s Grandson). Vyomika Vyas (Daadi’s Granddaughter). Uday Mohite (Inspector at Mansion). Kshitij Pawar (Constable at Mansion). Babu Khan (Bicycle Rider on Road). Nikhil Mehta (Bike Rider on Raod). Kesar Singh (Walking Man on Road). Vijay Sarupriya (Dushyant’s Father). Manisha Sharma (Dushyant’s Mother). Yogesh Silveru (Aatmaram Guard #1). Wilson Tiger (Aatmaram Guard #2). Vijay Baviskar (Male Band Pop Member). Justin Dcruz (Male Pop Band Member). Ranvijay Kumar (Male Band Pop Member). Thapa Praveen (Male Band Pop Member). Shefali Chauhan (Female Pop Band Member). Siman Khanwani (Female Pop Band Member). Kushi Maroo (Female Pop Band Member). Ridhhi (Female Pop Band Member). Altaf Yusuf (Undertaker #1). David Nadar (Undertaker #2). Nasir Kurla (Undertaker #3). Samir Ali (Undertaker #4)

Languages Hindi

Producers Farhan Akhtar. Diya Bachchani. Sumit Gyanchandaney. Kassim Jagmagia. Abbas Raza Khan. Vishal Ramchandani. Oajaswi Sharma. Ritesh Sidhwani. Sanjay Soni. Siddharth Soni. Rupali Suresh Vaidya

Production Excel Entertainment
